required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: TDCS Effects on Motor Learning and Motor Control in Healthy Subjetcs
clinical_study.official_title: Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation Effects on Motor Learning and Motor Control in Healthy Subjetcs

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical Trial with two groups, transcranial direct current stimulation aplication and sham; triple blinded. The protocol is applied 5 consecutive days during the training of a manual dexterity task. Manual dexterity and somatosensory variables are measured pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, and 5 days after finish the intervention.

detailed_description.textblock:
Clinical Trial with two groups, transcranial direct current stimulation aplication (1 mA ) and sham (ramp up and down of 30 seconds in total) . Bouth interventions will last 20 minutes; at the same time of the aplication bouth are going to train the manual dexterity with Purdue Pegboard Test.
This protocol is applied 5 consecutive days, also it have a follow up of 5 days more.
It is triple blinded. Manual dexterity and somatosensory variables are measured pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, and 5 days after finish the intervention.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in trained manual dexterity of the dominant hand
primary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
primary_outcome.description: One hand manual dexterity is measured with Perdue Pegboard test

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in trained manual dexterity of bouth hands
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Two hands dexterity is measured with Perdue Pegboard test

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in maximal isometric hand grip force
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Hand grip force is measured with Jamar dinamometer
Long form of the International Physical Activity Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in nontrained manual dexterity of the dominant hand
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: One hand dexterity is mesured with Minesota Test

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in nontrained manual dexterity of bouth hands
secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Two hands dexterity is mesured with Minesota Test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: The pressure detection treshold is measured with an algometer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: The pain detection treshold is measured with an algometer

secondary_outcome.time_frame: pre intervention, post one day of intervention, post 5 days of intervention, 5 days after finish the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Two points discrimination is measured with an esthesiometer

arm_group.description: 20 minutes of transcranial direct current stimulation 1 mA on bi-hemispheric colocation with cathode on the left M1 and anode on the right M1
20 minutes positioning the electrodes on the scalp. Whith an initial increasing of the current intensity by 10 seconds, until 1mA and a ramp down from 20 seconds to reach zero.

intervention.description: aplication of direct current stimulation on the scalp wiht sponge electrodes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy volunteers
Exclusion Criteria:
- metal or skin lesions on the head
- brain stimulation in the last 6 months
- family history of epilepsy or seizures
- pacemaker or any cardiac involvement
- inability to understand or execute the task
- taking drugs that may influence cognition
- pregnancy

patient_data.ipd_description: The individual praticipant data is going to be anonymized. Also, the participants are going to sing the consent of shareing his personal data.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Just before the clinical trial will be ended, and in an unlimited frame of time.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: With resaserches that will need this information for another studies.
